projects.title: Down To Play
projects.tagline: The simple app for next match player availability
projects.description: An app to help amatuer sports teams keep track of their fixtures and player availability. 400+ reviews on AppStore, 4.8 star average rating. #1 paid sports app in the UK one week after release

projects.title: Tapin
projects.tagline: Trusted career advice, delivered on social
projects.description: A platform to provide trusted careers advice to students through social media as well as to connect content creators to companies

projects.title: Silver Swan Search
projects.description: A bespoke recruitment platform integrated with Bullhorn CRM which was awarded a Research & Development grant by HMRC in 2020

projects.title: Idopia
projects.tagline: Idea sharing platform to help connect skilled entrepeneurs
projects.description: An invite only social media platform for entrepeneurs to create, recruit, team up, and get their projects off the ground at lightning speed

projects.title: Loop Beauty
projects.tagline: Your destination for the best in beauty for Women of Colour
projects.description: A one stop shop for beauty inspiration, tips, tutorials and makeup products from top beauty influencers

projects.title: Foenix Coding
projects.tagline: Industrial inkjet printers for all types of production lines
projects.description: A store front for some of the most advanced printing systems on the market today, clean, bold design to hold focus on the product
